name: burger
description: * Whenever a user submits a burger's name, the app will display the burger on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured. * Each burger in the waiting area also has a Devour it! button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page. * The app will store every burger in a database, whether devoured or not. * [Check out this video of the app for a run-through of how it works.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=msvdn95x9OM&feature=youtu.be)
